import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { categories } from '../../../public/static/data/shopCategories'; const ShopCategories = () => (
{categories && categories.map(category => (

{category.title}

    {category.links && category.links.map(link => (
  • {link}
    • ))}
))}
); export default ShopCategories;
